page.title: 17ACTON VILLAGE
page.content: Acton is a small village in the south of Cheshire.It has a school,Church and a hall called the parish hall.The church is called St Mary's.Acton has a pub aswell called the Star.At the parish hall they hold a pantomime, last years was "Babes in the wood". Acton used to have a Post Office. Acton has farms aswell and one of them is called Dorfold Dairy House Farm. Although Acton is a small village there are quite alot of houses.Some are very old and some new.Village farm and Church farm are the oldest farms in Acton.Up the road from Acton school is a pub called the Star.Down Wilbraham road are thirty six houses.
